ValidationRule.description: Electronic Solutions: ABM is required for the following type of agreement 1. Avionics Dealers 2. Pilatus Ltd Service Provider
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(Electronic_Solutions_ABM__c,"") && (ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Agreement__c,'Avionics Dealers') || ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Agreement__c,'Pilatus Ltd Service Provider'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill Electronic Solutions: ABM field
